name: Pam
description: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...
descriptionHtml: Pam handles an enormous workload at the junkyard and always gets it done! It's just a shame it keeps her away from her daughter, Jessie...

starPowers.name: Mamas Hug
starPowers.description: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for x health.
starPowers.descriptionHtml: Whenever Pam hits enemy Brawlers with Scrapstorm, she heals herself and nearby friendly Brawlers for x health.

starPowers.name: Mamas Squeeze
starPowers.description: Healing turret now also damages enemies for x damage per second.
starPowers.descriptionHtml: Healing turret now also damages enemies for x damage per second.

gadgets.name: Pulse Modulator
gadgets.description: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for x health.
gadgets.descriptionHtml: Pam triggers her turret to emit a pulse that heals allies inside the turret's range, including herself, for x health.

gadgets.name: Scrapsucker
gadgets.description: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.
gadgets.descriptionHtml: Each hit from Pam's next attack removes x% of opposing Brawlers' maximum ammo. Pam reclaims x% of the ammo for herself.
